basics.name: Dhanavikram Sekar
basics.summary: Software Engineer focusing on Data Science and Cloud, with a Master's Degree in Data Science from University of Colorado Boulder

education.institution: SSN College of Engineering, Anna University

work.name: University of Colorado Boulder
work.summary: Developer for Broadband Measurement Clearing House - A Network performance analytics project. I develop data pipelines and create visualizations for researchers so that they can focus on asking and answering questions.

work.name: Navajo Transitional Energy Company
work.summary: As an intern, I developed executive dashboards for rapid decision-making, built ELT pipelines with Fabric during the org's hybrid cloud migration, and automated daily repetitive tasks.

work.name: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
work.summary: My responsibilities revolve around development, maintenance and testing of data processing and machine learning utilities for a proprietary data science framework. Worked on monitoring, operational and engineeering aspects of the framework.
